scripts.setup: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000" && npm run soroban -- config network add standalone --rpc-url "http://localhost:8000/soroban/rpc" --network-passphrase "Standalone Network ; February 2017" && npm run soroban -- config identity fund --network standalone && export CONTRACT_ID=$(../../../../target/bin/soroban contract deploy --wasm ../../../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/test-wasms/test_custom_types.wasm --network standalone) && npm run soroban -- contract bindings typescript --contract-id $CONTRACT_ID --network standalone --output-dir ./node_modules/test-custom-types --overwrite || { echo "Make sure you're running standalone RPC network on localhost:8000" && exit 1; }
